law.catch_line: Special reviews requested by members of General Assembly, granted when.
law.text: A member of the General Assembly may, by written request and by written notice of at least six (6) days, request the Commission to direct a special review of any state agency, unit or program. Upon the vote of the majority of the Commission approving the request, the director of the Legislative Research Commission shall cause such review to be made.
law.history: Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 384,sec. 7, effective June 21, 1974. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 42, sec. 12, effective July 1, 1966.

metadata.lrc-note: This is former KRS 6.390 as amended, renumbered by the Reviser of Statutes in 1974.
